programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers arrest a suspect hoarding drugs inside a motel room. A driver admits to drug and alcohol use after being pulled over. Officers assist in the search for a runaway child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers stop a man riding a bicycle in the middle of the street with no backlight. Suspects have a fun night out in a neighborhood known for drugs. Officers are dispatched to help a woman when her boyfriend threatens her with a brick.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E09 What’s my name again?
programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver takes several units on a reckless journey driving on the wrong side of the highway. Officers set up a reverse sting operation to capture a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E29 Who Wet the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers are assaulted by the brother of a suspect who is resisting arrest. A resident sprays water on his neighbor’s noisy dogs. Officers recover drugs and cash after pulling over a motorist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: US Marshals are tasked with finding a young boy that has been kidnapped for ransom. A man suspected of dealing contraband is reported by his ex-girlfriends mother. Officers raid a home looking for a dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers apprehend a man in possession of stolen property brandishing a rifle. Officers respond to a call of brothers in a fist fight. Police intervene when a couple argues in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers arrest a female driver for drug possession and whose mother scolds her before she’s carted off to jail. An officer arrests a man who alleges that he’s waiting for his date for outstanding warrants and a stolen vehicle. An officer takes a known prostitute to jail.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman stuffs drugs into her under garments. A mother attacks her daughter because she got married in Vegas. Officers are called when a woman is accused of stalking her friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E11 First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A suicidal man tries to taunt police into shooting him. Undercover officers expose an illegal operation at a pain management clinic. A woman claims she’s just a bystander to a motorcycle hit and run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E21 Don't Make her Angry
programme.desc: A man needs police assistance when his angry ex-girlfriend crawls through his window. Police must play hide-and-seek when they attempt to execute an arrest warrant. A man is threatened with violence when he refuses to turn his car’s headlights off.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Unhappy about getting stopped for drinking while biking, a man takes off on foot. A woman in her PJs doesn’t know how she wound up in a stolen vehicle. Officers discover a couple smoking Meth in front of a young child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed chase with a motorcyclist. A man becomes verbally abusive with a woman and her mother after a boating trip. Police seize a rifle and 20 rounds of ammo from a man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E19 You Didn't Get Very Far
programme.desc: A husky cyclist takes a spill when he tries to flee. Officers chase a suspect in a stolen car who says he was just fixing it for a friend. A man's denials of drug use lose credibility when cops find a meth pipe in his vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E07 No Money, More Problems
programme.desc: A woman hides in her apartment after she skips out on paying her cab fare. A knife fight results in multiple calls to the police for help. A French tourist get a bus ride from Hell in Florida.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia. A man is arrested in a stolen car containing drugs and a firearm.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman tells Officers she’s a vampire. Officers question a colorful man dressed as a woman. A violent woman screams obscenities at Officers and needs to be restrained.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man sneaking away from a bar fight claims he was chased by a truck. Deputies are called when a woman assaults people at a skating rink. A drunk man abandons his truck on train tracks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Officers organize a buy-bust sting. Racoons hide out in a woman's chimney. A man gets pulled over for soliciting a prostitute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E30 Follow the Tire Tracks
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Three men are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at an apartment complex. An officer discovers a teenager is dating an older man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E24 I’m With You Guys
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when Officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers conduct a sting using a decoy vehicle. A man with a knife flees the scene of a dispute with his baby mama. Deputies are dispatched when a man is assaulted with a shovel over twenty dollars.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E22 Shots in the Big Easy
programme.desc: In New Orleans, police respond to a shots fired call. A suspect peddles a bike on the wrong side of the road with his girlfriend on the handlebars. A woman reports her husband to the police when he throws her down the stairs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers find drugs after pursuing a stolen vehicle. A man is found unconscious behind the wheel of a car. Officers intervene in a domestic dispute between a stripper and her boyfriend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A knife wielding man hangs around the lot of a convenience store. An intoxicated man in speedos flees from the police after urinating in a parking lot. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute after a man locks his girlfriend in the bathroom.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffice stop, an officer witnesses a cyclist get hit by a motorist. An officer investigates a domestic disturbance call involving some spousal infidelity. Authorities respond to a tip regarding a heavy weight drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a naked man inside a school. A woman being questioned by Police is oblivious to her wardrobe malfunction. Officers on patrol order several female nude sunbathers to cover up.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E11 This Man Stabbed Me
programme.desc: A car thief leads police on a high-speed chase until officers pit his vehicle to end the pursuit. Cops cool off a baby and search for the man who left him in a car. Potty-mouthed witnesses inform officers that their friend has been stabbed in the chest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies are called to a vehicle burglary in progress at an apartment complex. A traffic stop results in the discovery of drug paraphernalia. An Officer locates a stolen van and discovers drug paraphernalia in the suspect’s purse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Hitching a ride home with the wrong guy almost lands one woman in the slammer. A known prostitute won’t be going on a second date. When a domestic partner refuses to leave home, officers intervene.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Vice Officers pose as drug dealers in an illegal drug transaction. A man is pulled over and arrested for driving a stolen vehicle. Three men are caught robbing a coin machine.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E16 My Bills Won't Wait
programme.desc: A suspect calls the police and states that he wants to kill himself and any officer who tries to help him. None of the three occupants of a stopped car will admit to ownership of a bag of drugs. A man begs not to be arrested so that he can pay child support.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The boat unit contends with an unruly suspect and his equally unpredictable dogs. Two burglary suspects try to claim car trouble when they're found at the scene of the crime. A repentant meth addict is caught by officers on the brink of his latest relapse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers observe a man trying to pick up a hidden stash of narcotics. Occupants of suspicious vehicles have outstanding warrants. A domestic battery is investigated and justice is served.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers question a couple looking to score. Officers respond to a domestic violence call in which it is unclear what exactly transpired. Officers assist on a shots fired call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E20 Not My Text Messages
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop turns into a drug bust when cops turn up evidence of the driver's sizable habit. A suspicious man waiting in a parked car can't explain the incriminating texts on his phone. Two frequent flyers give officers a hard time when pulled over in a well-known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E29 The Last Home Invasion
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An assailant attacks a woman after bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on a cameraman’s equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A Special Operations Unit coordinates a city-wide “buy-bust” sting designed to apprehend dealers. Officers join units in pursuit of a stolen SUV. An officer arrests brothers for public intoxication.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coax a man off a large construction crane. An inebriated man is jailed for domestic abuse. A man is rescued from a flash flood, but his truck isn’t so lucky.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

Stop it before the whole village is covered with pancakes!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decade's biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So who's no.1?

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Better Known For Other Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Better Known For Other Things!
programme.desc: Anyone for a bit of Kojak rapping or Hutch singing? TV stars, movie stars & comedians - they all made 70s music (of variable quality), but became better known for something else!

programme.title: We Will Rock You!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We Will Rock You!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar anthems! A classic decade for Queen, Status Quo, Led Zepp, Black Sabbath, The Stones & Thin Lizzy.

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.desc: Remember when rock was WILD? From '64 to '74 the pioneering heroes presented by a man who was at the centre of it all - from The Kinks to The Beatles to Black Sabbath to Queen!

programme.title: Taking a Big Bite out of Boston

programme.title: Leveling Up in New York City
programme.desc: Ben Hundreds hits cutting edge concepts in NYC like Contra, Wildair, Madame Vo and Dhamaka.

programme.title: The Soul of Los Angeles
programme.desc: Ben Hundreds hits restaurants inspired by heritage: Cobi’s, Alta Adams and Yangban Society; Plus best tacos.

programme.title: Melting Pot of Culture
programme.desc: Four guests from different cultures give us a world tour through food in this one of a kind episode.

programme.title: Music & Indo-Chinese
programme.desc: Shrim discusses how Indians have their own version of Chinese food while talking to some local musicians.

programme.title: Beauty & Chaats
programme.desc: Shrim chats with our guests about beauty standards in India, while enjoying their favourite chaat.

programme.title: Start-ups & Lunch On The Go
programme.desc: Entrepreneurs talks to Shrim about their start-ups while indulging in some lip-smacking lunch.

programme.title: Love & Home Food
programme.desc: Shrim talks to a few lovers about inter-cultural food, race and sexuality.

programme.title: Legacies and Thai Cuisine
programme.desc: Stephanie makes Thai and Peruvian dishes with home chef Brittaney and swap stories about their moms’ cooking.

programme.title: Stephanie and the Pitmaster
programme.desc: Stephanie joins home chef, Fernando Carrillo, for a backyard BBQ and a trip to LA institution Carnitas el Momo

programme.title: Middle East Street Food Eats
programme.desc: Stephanie highlights the diversity of Middle Eastern cuisine through the lens of street food.

programme.title: Key Ingredients of West African Cuisine
programme.desc: Stephanie learns the key ingredients to Nigerian cooking.

programme.title: Joys of Jamaican Cooking
programme.desc: Stephanie meets home cook Kat and restaurant owner Chef Tony to learn about Caribbean cooking.

programme.title: The Future of Restaurants
programme.desc: Roy breaks bread with Chef Wolfgang Puck, and others who want to create a more equitable restaurant model.

programme.title: From Seed to Table
programme.desc: Roy meets chef & activist Alice Waters, farmer Kristyn Leach and urban gardeners to discuss seed sovereignty.

programme.title: Food As Resistance

programme.title: Nature's Beauty: World of Relaxation
programme.desc: A seamless mix of several Nature Relaxation's shorter length productions.

programme.title: New Zealand Gardens
programme.desc: The filmmaker explores the breath-taking gardens of New Zealand and provides the diversity and beauty of these enchanting havens.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways
programme.desc: Spend a restful moment in Maui, a tropical paradise of gleaming white sand beaches and turquoise waters.

programme.title: Beach Paradise: East Bali
programme.desc: A serene soundtrack amidst a journey to spectacular beaches in Bali.

programme.title: Above & Under
programme.desc: Flying above beachy shores and diving deep into crystal-clear waters brimming with sea creatures.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: An aerial journey to the remote fjiords and valleys of eastern Iceland.

programme.title: Hawaii Beaches: Oahu 2
programme.desc: Escaping to the sandy solitudes of Hawaii's tropical beaches.

programme.title: Healing Hawaii: Kauai
programme.desc: A visual and audio journey around the exotic island paradise of Kauai, known as the Garden Isle. 60 different one-minute scenes of nature, slowly transitioning from one to the next.

programme.title: Islands of Paradise
programme.desc: The beautiful Yasawa islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Amritsar,where recipes have been passed down generations. Alex explores it in Quest.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Roros, Norway
programme.desc: Røros, a historical Norwegian copper mining town full of impeccable wooden buildings, is a place that makes you travel back in time. Jamie Lowe strolls around the quaint town and checks out the mining museum to learn about the town’s fascinating history. Following this, he goes through Lærdal Tunnel, the world’s longest road tunnel, on his way to Flåm. Upon reaching, he goes to the Flåm Railway Museum, where he gets to know the exciting stories behind building the world's steepest railway.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack, Plitvice Lopar and Zagreb Croatia
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Peru Inca Valley & Machu Picchu
programme.desc: Scaling rocks and defying heights, Milagros finds herself suspended 1200 feet above the ground at the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Boarding Pass Flam, Norway
programme.desc: Flåm is an idyllic town sitting in a spectacular setting at the head of Aurlandsfjorden. Here, Jamie Lowe takes a train ride filled with breathtaking views along Flåmsbana, the world’s steepest railway line. He also takes a cruise to see the stunning UNESCO-listed fjord, Nærøyfjord, and goes on to experience the cuisine and ways of life of the Vikings in Njardarheimr, a Viking village in nearby Gudvangen.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Xp Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: With a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, Oslo’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 World Spas Gaya Island Resort, Malaysia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries a massage inspired by the waves of the sea and a chocolate vanilla body wrap at the Gaya Island Resort in Malaysia.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Embarking on a homecoming adventure in the heart of the Peruvian Amazonas, Milagros explores her roots like never before.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets a Nawab in Lucknow, who shows her how to make Gosht Mawazad, a decadent Awadhi dish with mutton and dry fruits.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo, the 1000-year-old Norwegian capital, is a compact and fun city that offers the perfect experience of contemporary cultural life in Norway. Here, Jamie Lowe visits iconic attractions such as the Nobel Peace Center, as well as more offbeat attractions such as the miniature bottle gallery and Frogner Park, which features 200 statues created by world-famous sculptor, Gustav Vigeland. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Xp Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed ships used by the legendary Vikings of Norway.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: As Milagros delves deeper into the heart of the Amazonas, her journey takes a thrilling turn. In search of rare birds, she embarks on a boat ride at dawn. As the day progresses, she meets an indigenous tribe and unlocks ancient hunting secrets with them.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets the descendants of the royal families of Hyderabad and Lucknow, and they tell her about the culture and cuisine of both kingdoms.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass North Cape, Norway
programme.desc: Famous journalist and explorer, Jamie Lowe visits the unofficial capital of the Northern Lights in Norway, Alta, where he encounters the two most exciting experiences the place has to offer: he witnesses the Aurora Borealis and he visits the UNESCO-listed Alta Museum with its rock carvings dating back to 7000 years ago. To get the full winter experience, he also tries reindeer sledding, spends a night at Sorrisniva ice hotel, and visits North Cape, the northernmost point of Europe.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Frankfurt is the financial capital of the European Union. Kristina discovers that the city has much more to offer than just a good business meeting, as she learns about its history and architecture through its famous sights such as the Kaizerdom Cathedral and the Eltz Castle. She also goes to Rudesheim, where she encounters an amazing collection of data operated music instruments.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka

programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind

programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun

programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break

programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.
